pageTitle: The Prime Minister announces changes in the senior ranks of the Public Service | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today announced the following changes in the senior ranks of the Public Service:

Marie Lemay, currently Deputy Minister of Public Services and Procurement, becomes Senior Advisor to the Privy Council Office, effective January 28, 2019, prior to an upcoming appointment.

Bill Matthews, currently Senior Associate Deputy Minister of National Defence, becomes Deputy Minister of Public Services and Procurement, effective January 28, 2019.

Claude Rochette, currently Assistant Deputy Minister of Finance and Chief Financial Officer of National Defence, becomes Associate Deputy Minister of National Defence, effective January 28, 2019.
